## Model.playAnimation() method

Starts playing an animation of the model

**Signature:**

```typescript
playAnimation(name: string, repeat?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the animation to play |
|  repeat | number | _(Optional)_ The repeat times, 0 for always repeating |

**Returns:**

void
